About GLA University

Ganesh Lal Agrawal University, known more famously as GLA Online University, was established in 1991 in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh by N. D. Agrawal. GLA University is a privately owned institution of higher education that provides courses in the form of degrees and diplomas.

The university has received the necessary accreditations from UGC-DEB as well as other statutory bodies such as AICTE, NAAC (rated ‘A’), BCI etc. It has also received a special recognition from the Government of Uttar Pradesh and is a reputed and prestigious university to pursue higher education form.

GLA University has its own online functionary which aims to provide top educational facilities to students irrespective of location by tapping on virtual technological means for educational dissemination. The university offers online courses in the domains of management, commerce, computer sciences, wealth management and more.

GLA University has a very value-rooted approach to education and strives to extend equally insightful and comprehensive learning experiences to students enrolled in the online courses that boost not only their knowledge and skills but also their values.

The university’s online courses are provided to students at very pocket-friendly ranges, and are integrated with a number of efficient support features such as merit scholarships, admissions and student support, placement services and LMS.

Approvals
  • UGC
  • AICTE
  • AIU
  • NAAC A+

 

GLA University Online Admission Process

The admission process in the GLA Online University is conducted in the online mode. So, there is no need to visit the campus for the admission process. Direct admissions are done on the basis of educational qualifications. The admission procedure for 2024 for the online courses at GLA Online University is as follows:

Step 1: First go to the official website of GLA online university and register yourself

Step 2: Fill in the application form carefully with all your personal, academic, and professional details.

Step 3: Pay the fee online as specified in the application form.

Step 4: Upload all the required documents for eligibility verification

Step 5: Once all your documents have been verified by the admissions authority of the university, you will receive the onboarding details if you fulfill the eligibility criteria.

List of Documents
  • Marksheets
  • Residential Proof
  • Proof of Date of Birth
  • Government Issued ID
  • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
  • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
  • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
  • Two passport size colored photographs
  • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why GLA University

GLA Online University has the approvals from bodies like UGC-DEB as well as AICTE (for its technical courses) and is a credible online educational institution.

There are provisions for both diploma and degree courses along with relevant specializations that students can choose from.

The learning support of the university has features like live lectures and recorded lectures (both virtual), webinars, discussion forums, virtual course materials as well as systematic curriculum planning and course coordination to ensure smooth learning.

The online programs have placement support as well and students stand the chance to get placed in companies like Accenture, Capgemini, Samsung, Amazon, Honda and more.

The faculty at GLA University has extensive hands-on experience in delivering online education and is highly qualified in their field of specialization.

The student support bodies of the university are responsive, cooperative and prompt in addressing student concerns via online mode itself. GLA Online University has the approvals from BCI Government of Uttar Pradesh.
